categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Rhoon was a group of three Delta-class DX-9 stormtrooper transports used by the Alliance to Restore the Republic to carry base equipment during the evacuation of Brigia in Operation Strike Fear. However, all three were destroyed by the Imperial-class Star Destroyer Invincible, which arrived during the operation.

In the video game Star Wars: X-Wing, it is possible to save the transports. The player must give them the order to return home (Press Shift-H after targeting each transport) at the very beginning of the mission to guarantee their survival.
